posts.title: My First post!
posts.text: To plan my blog building and updating project, I started to get feelings of hard working hours. Hereâ€™s the purpose brought me back to the question that I need to build it. To learn on how to use the program languages starting from Java Script until some of server side lauguage. To leave a log of my understanding of programing in my own level of understanding. As a bilingual person, I want to build my blog in two ways. One in Korean, the other in English. Hey! To keep learning on how to use the system language, I decided to bring all my interests to be mixed with my original thinking, Atom[^stackedit] will be the main editor for the posting.

posts.title: Why do I start the new project?
Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
